spells.description: Use: Zoom in on the targeted location.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,089 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Strength by 2,029, up to 10,145.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.4 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.
